name: pristinely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows something is new, perfect, or very clean: Following the renovation, both the house and its contents have been pristinely preserved. The seats are comfortably cushioned, and the food is served on pristinely white plates.
More examplesFewer examplesThe new restaurant is in a pristinely restored townhouse in the Chinatown district. The streets of bungalows have pristinely manicured gardens.The cupcakes are placed pristinely into a pink gift box, fastened with a ribbon.
